title: Milk: The Surprising Story of Milk Through the Ages
description:
Milk: The Surprising Story of Milk Through the Ages by Anne Mendelson
English | 2008 | ISBN: 1400044103 | ISBN-13: 9781400044108 | 352 pages | EPUB | 4,3 MB

Anne Mendelson, author of Stand Facing the Stove, first explores the earliest Old World homes of yogurt and kindred fermented products made primarily from sheepÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s and goatsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ milk and soured as a natural consequence of climate. Out of this ancient heritage from lands that include Greece, Bosnia, Turkey, Israel, Persia, Afghanistan, and India, she mines a rich source of culinary traditions.
